descriptionHtml:
player.setav Health 1500
player.setav Magicka 5000
player.setav Stamina 1000
player.setav HealRate 300
player.setav MagickaRate 300
player.setav StaminaRate 100
player.setav ShoutRecoveryMult 0
player.setav CombatHealthRegenMult 2
player.setav CarryWeight 999999
player.setav AttackDamageMult 100
player.setav DetectLifeRange 1000
player.forceav CritChance 100
player.forceav Magicresist 100
player.forceav weaponspeedmult 2
player.forceav leftweaponspeedmult 2
player.forceav rightweaponspeedmult 2
player.modav PoisonResist 100
player.modav DiseaseResist 100
player.modav leftitemcharge 300
player.modav rightitemcharge 300

put in data folder open consolle  \\   write   bat sara    press invio and \\  
enjoy

no recharge mage staff. for critchance is better if you no have activate crit perks
this is it my parametry. you can exchange all
sorry my english XD
